Class BranchScreenController

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.controller.ScreenController
      • gameplayer.controller.BranchScreenController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IScreenController

    public abstract class BranchScreenController
extends ScreenController
    This abstract controller class will allow returning to splash functionality for all screens that are branches off the splash screen
    Author:
    Carine
